attributes.action: Forward medical history to adoptive parents and use stricter charater background matching, rather than just financial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I suffered a brain hemohage in 2005 and used to suffer bad heads as a child. I have since found out since finding my birth mother that it is a hereditary condition. Also my adoptive parents were far from a perfect match, in fact it seems based on financial  
rather than suitability.
